abstract: New York City Police Officer Vladimir Sosa is arrested in Bronx and charged with raping 16-year-old parishioner of church where he had active role in parish activities; Sosa is suspended without pay and stripped of his badge and gun; investigators, who were contacted by girl's mother, believe encounters took place in the officer's Bronx home.
lead_paragraph: The officer was arrested Tuesday and charged with raping a 16-year-old parishioner of the church they both attend, the authorities said.

headline.main: Bronx Police Officer Charged With Raping a Teenage Girl
headline.print_headline: Bronx Police Officer Charged With Raping a 16-Year-Old

snippet: The officer was arrested Tuesday and charged with raping a 16-year-old parishioner of the church they both attend, the authorities said.
